Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_CENTERMOHOJACDET2 WHERE CENTRALCODI=:CENTRALCODI AND IND_DEL= :IND_DEL ORDER BY DET2CENTERMHCCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_CENTERMOHOJACDET2 ( DET2CENTERMHCCODI, CENTRALCODI, DATACATCODI, TIPO, ANIO, TRIMESTRE, VALOR, USU_CREACION, IND_DEL, FEC_CREACION ) VALUES ( :DET2CENTERMHCCODI, :CENTRALCODI, :DATACATCODI, :TIPO, :ANIO, :TRIMESTRE, :VALOR, :USU_CREACION, :IND_DEL, :FEC_CREACION )

UPDATE CAM_CENTERMOHOJACDET2 SET CENTRALCODI = :CENTRALCODI, DATACATCODI = :DATACATCODI, TIPO = :TIPO, ANIO = :ANIO, TRIMESTRE = :TRIMESTRE, VALOR = :VALOR, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, WHERE DET2CENTERMHCCODI = :DET2CENTERMHCCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_CENTERMOHOJACDET2 ORDER BY DET2CENTERMHCCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

UPDATE CAM_CENTERMOHOJACDET2 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE CENTRALCODI = (SELECT CENTRALCODI FROM CAM_CENTERMOHOJAC WHERE PROYCODI =:PROYCODI AND IND_DEL='0' ) AND IND_DEL='0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_CENTERMOHOJACDET2 WHERE CENTRALCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
